name: Times Square
description: The bustling heart of Manhattan, filled with bright lights and towering electronic billboards.

name: Empire State Building
description: An iconic Art Deco skyscraper offering panoramic views of the city from its observation deck.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island, a symbol of freedom and democracy.

name: Energy Node
description: A powerful energy source hidden beneath the streets of New York.

name: Tech Salvage
description: Abandoned experimental technology waiting to be recovered and repurposed.

name: Chelsea Market
description: A bustling food hall and shopping center where traders sell rare items.

name: Hidden Artisan
description: A secret workshop specializing in crafting unique artifacts.

name: Central Park Anomaly
description: Strange energy readings have been detected in Central Park. Approach with caution!

name: Subway Tunnels
description: Abandoned subway tunnels filled with unknown dangers and strange creatures.

name: Brooklyn Bridge Mystery
description: Reports of unusual activity near Brooklyn Bridge need investigation.

name: Missing Scientist
description: A prominent researcher has disappeared from their lab in Manhattan.
